Furbo For Good

$1 of every new Furbo Dog Nanny
Subscription is donated to the Furbo
charity fund.

What is the Furbo For Good?


The Furbo charity fund will be used to support community initiatives and charities that are doing great work in the field of Animal Welfare.

At Furbo, we believe in reciprocating the unconditional love our pets have for us and inspiring the community to share the same unconditional love with all humans, animals, and our planet. Our goal is to support and make an impact on communities and organizations that we are passionate about.

Furbo Save Lives

Furbo's features are designed specifically to keep dogs safe when they are home alone. Last year, Furbo helped save 2801 dogs’ lives.
